item.title: Automating with Python: A start
item.author: gmail.com (Earving)
item.description: I remember once hearing "No matter what you do for living, learn a programming language it will ease your life." Although, using Linux takes you to a long trip of practicing scripting with bash, I was never really into programming (still not, eventhough I would have liked at some point).
